Container.Name: OpenAIWebUI
Container.Overview:
Unraid compatible OpenAI WebUI. Requires your valid OpenAI API key.
Please review https://github.com/Infotrend-Inc/OpenAI_WebUI/README.md for two sections in particular: - the .env supported environment variables that are defined in this template - the Unraid specific setup section that introduces features not enabled by default, including the ability to password protect the WebUI.
Extra parameters are available under the advanced settings. - the default savedir is /iti/savedir. /iti is mounted from within the appdata folder. - When using the "prompt presets" feature, the directory must exist (recommended location: /iti/prompt_presets). - When using the "prompt presets settings" feature, the JSON file must exist (recommended location: /iti/prompt_presets.json).

Config.Name: Run directory
Config.Description: Mount directory for application files. /iti/savedir matches value used for OAIWUI_SAVEDIR

Config.Name: OAIWUI_SAVEDIR
Config.Description: Required: location where generated files are placed

Config.Name: OAIWUI_GPT_ONLY
Config.Description: If True, only show the GPT UI If False, show both the GPT and the DallE UI

Config.Name: OAIWUI_GPT_MODELS
Config.Description: Required: comma-separated list of GPT models authorized for the provided API Key

Config.Name: OAIWUI_DALLE_MODELS
Config.Description: Required: comma-separated list of DALL-E models authorized for the provided API Key

Config.Name: OAIWUI_GPT_VISION
Config.Description: For compatible models, disable their vision capabilities

Config.Name: OAIWUI_IGNORE_EMPTY
Config.Description: Required for Unraid: avoid errors in case some (not all) environment variables are not set

Config.Name: OAIWUI_USERNAME
Config.Description: Default username (leave blank to be prompted)

Config.Name: OAIWUI_PROMPT_PRESETS_DIR
Config.Description: Directory that contains prompt presets (see GitHub for examples). If a directory is provided, it must contains at least one valid json file

Config.Name: OAIWUI_PROMPT_PRESETS_ONLY
Config.Description: Json file that contains valid settings to use for the OAIWUI_PROMPT_PRESETS_DIR presets
